title: Stable Android 12 update goes live for the Moto G Pro
content:
In December, Motorola shared a list of eligible smartphones that would get the Android 12 update. At the time the company said that the first updates would begin rolling out sometime in February. As promised Motorola has now kicked off the Android 12 rollout, starting with the Moto G Pro (also known as Moto G

The post Stable Android 12 update goes live for the Moto G Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola has started rolling out the stable Android 12 update to the Moto G Pro (variant XT2043-7). The update is live in the UK.
